content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. It sounds like you've got a solid plan in place to stay organized and on top of new episodes and season releases.

TV Time and Trakt are both excellent choices for tracking your shows and setting reminders. They'll help you stay focused and ensure you never miss an episode.

Enabling notifications on your streaming platforms and following your favorite shows on social media will also keep you informed about new content and any updates.

Remember, the key is to find a system that works for you and your viewing habits. Don't be afraid to experiment and adjust your approach as needed.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, happy watching and enjoy keeping track of your shows!

(And don't forget to catch up on "For All Mankind"!)
